means: 油炸，油煎（ fry的过去式和过去分词 ）
弗里德(Alfred Hermann,1864-1921，奥地利著述家、记者，曾获1911年诺贝尔和平奖)

sentence.Network_en: The place stinks of fried onions.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个地方有股煎洋葱的刺鼻气味。

entry.def: When you fry food, you cook it in a pan that contains hot fat or oil.

example.ex: Fry the breadcrumbs until golden brown.
example.tran: 把面包屑炸成金褐色为止。

entry.def: Fry are very small, young fish.
Fries are the same as French fries.

entry.tran: (尤指为尽快做好便饭)煎一下，炸一下
entry.def: If you fry up food, you fry it, especially in order to make a quick, casual meal.

example.ex: She cuts and fries the mixture up into a potato doughnut called Quin-Kuria.
example.tran: 她把混料切好后放进油里炸成一种叫做Quin-Kuria 的土豆炸面圈。

example.en: When Bob came home southern-fried, his wife nearly killed him.
example.zh: 当鲍勃喝得醉醺醺回家时,他妻子恨不得要杀死他。
